message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, so please let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. I really like the product and I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm on a budget and need to make sure it fits within my means. Can you meet me at $18,000?

Bob, I understand your budget considerations, but $18,000 is quite a bit lower than I'd be comfortable with.  How about we meet in the middle at $19,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but $19,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $17,500, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means. Can you meet me at $17,500?
